mobs.LongDesc: Goethe is here, staring blindly into space.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Goethe exudes an aura of verbosity.

mobs.LongDesc: Harry the Hare Krishna is busy burning incense and singing.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Harry is a tall man with a shaven head and a long pony tail... gee I wonder
if he is a Hare Krishna.

mobs.LongDesc: Wally the Wizard is busy playing with his magical items.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Wally is an old, long haired man with an obvious affection to strange and
unusual magic items.  When he looks at you, he doesn't seem to be completely
there.

mobs.LongDesc: The Policeman is here, walking his beat.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Specifically recruited by the upper class people of New Sparta, there
is no one more respectable and honest than your on duty policeman.

mobs.LongDesc: The Cop is wandering around looking for donuts.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You can see that this guy does not concentrate very much on his job and tends 
to look the other way.  He seems to be more interested in filling his belly 
with donuts than in protecting the city.

mobs.LongDesc: A Mugger is thinking about taking your money or your life.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Driven to desperate measures, this leech of society is after one thing...
your money.  He'll do anything to get it, too.

mobs.LongDesc: A Tourist is here, taking in the sights.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Every metropolis has them, well so does New Sparta.  Be careful not to get
caught in their line of sight.

mobs.LongDesc: Norm is drinking another beer.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see Norm from Cheers, he is big, fat, drinks a lot and is an overall
jolly fellow.

mobs.LongDesc: Cliff is rattling off useless trivia.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A postal worker who never seems to be doing his job, Cliff is out of touch
with reality and tends to be annoying--even to his friends.

mobs.LongDesc: Carla is waiting on tables.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Carla splashes a drink in your face.

mobs.LongDesc: Woody is waiting to serve you a drink.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A farm boy from Indiana, he has not quite fit into the atmosphere of
the big city yet.

mobs.LongDesc: Mayor Abe is about, inspecting the city.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This high official, like most other politicians, seems uninterested
in helping the community.  Not a man to be trifled with, the Mayor
is reputed to have ties with the mob kingpin--Lucifer.

mobs.LongDesc: Rebecca Howe is hurrying about making sure Cheers is in order.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A very harried but yet beautiful woman.  Most of her anguish stems from
her sexual frustrations and from attempting to keep Cheers in order.

mobs.LongDesc: Sam is here, hitting on the women.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A very handsome, self-assured ex-baseball player who is very popular
with the ladies, but often finds himself in sticky situations.

mobs.LongDesc: Frazier is here psychoanalyzing patrons in the bar.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Though very emotionally unstable for a psychiatrist, Dr. Crane tries
to aid people with their problems while creating his own.

mobs.LongDesc: Lilith is sitting at the bar, keeping a watchful eye on Frazier.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A calm, thoroughly rational and logical thinker on the outside--a wild, 
crazy, sexual goddess on the inside.

mobs.LongDesc: Paul is here, drinking a beer.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Paul is a robust man, who tends to be a bit childish when around Norm and
Cliff.

mobs.LongDesc: An Alley Cat is looking for food.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is an everyday unwanted alley cat who spends most of his day looking 
for food.

mobs.LongDesc: Pee Wee is doing something you would rather not like to know.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Pee Wee is the owner of this peep show, so you'd better not piss him off.

mobs.LongDesc: A punk is here, deciding what color to spray paint your back.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a punk who is more than willing to knock off an old lady for a few 
bucks.

mobs.LongDesc: A skinhead is here, looking for a punk to kill.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Skinheads are mean and nasty... better not stare too long.

mobs.LongDesc: A prostitute is soliciting you.
mobs.DetailedDesc: When you look at her she says, "Hey baby, wanna party?"

mobs.LongDesc: Jonathan Hill is here, welcoming his costumers.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This is the evil bald-headed guy who runs Melville.

mobs.LongDesc: The Bishop is here, look for a crime to solve.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Da Da Deah (sorry for the bad sound effects)!  It's the Bishop!

mobs.LongDesc: A dockworker is busy moving crates.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dockworkers get very strong from lifting crates and the size of his muscles
make you think twice about attacking him.

mobs.LongDesc: A prostitute is here, looking for customers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
When you take a closer look, you realize that this is not the lovely lady
you first laid eyes on, but is really just a female impersonator.

mobs.LongDesc:
A pimp is busy counting his money to make sure his women haven't been 
cheating him.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You over hear the pimp reciting poetry...
        Bitch better have my money
        not some, not half
        but all my cash!

mobs.LongDesc: A Raiders' lineman is here hunting for the ball.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one of Orcland's lineman.  He is a balanced player, but has no
outstanding abilities.

mobs.LongDesc: A Warriors' lineman is here hunting for the ball.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one of New Sparta's lineman.  He is a balanced player, but has no
outstanding abilities.

mobs.LongDesc: A Raiders' catcher is here running a pattern.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one of the Orcs' skilled catchers.  He is quick, but not very
powerful.

mobs.LongDesc: A Warriors' catcher is here running a pattern.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one of the Warriors' skilled catchers.  He is quick, but not very
powerful.

mobs.LongDesc: A Raiders' blocker is trying to pave an open pathway.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the slowest (both physically AND mentally) of the bloodbowl
players.  However, he is also very large and powerful, so be careful
when tangling with him.

mobs.LongDesc: A Warriors' blocker is trying to pave an open pathway.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the slowest (both physically AND mentally) of the bloodbowl
players.  However, he is also very large and powerful, so be careful
when tangling with him.

mobs.LongDesc: A Raiders' thrower, attempting a pass.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Similar to a quarterback, this is a player with both mobility and a
cannon for an arm.  He can also hold his own when hitting with the
big boys.

mobs.LongDesc: A Warriors' thrower, attempting a pass.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Similar to a quarterback, this is a player with both mobility and a
cannon for an arm.  He can also hold his own when hitting with the
big boys.

mobs.LongDesc: A fierce Raiders' blitzer, waiting to tear someone limb from limb.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An all-around fearsome athlete, the blitzer is the toughest most
aggressive player on the bloodbowl field.

mobs.LongDesc: A fierce Warriors' blitzer, waiting to tear someone limb from limb.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An all-around fearsome athlete, the blitzer is the toughest most
aggressive player on the bloodbowl field.

mobs.LongDesc: A loyal fan is here enjoying the game.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Your average sports fan, who attends a game now and then.

mobs.LongDesc: A child is here, wandering around.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Awww, how cute!!!

mobs.LongDesc: A vendor is here peddling his goods.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A merchant with a variety of goods, with nothing you particularly need.

mobs.LongDesc: A construction worker is here on his break.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A strong, dirty, harsh-talking construction worker.

mobs.LongDesc: A drunk, rowdy fan is here, making an ass of himself.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Sit down, sit down, sit down, sit down--sit down you're rocking
the boat.

mobs.LongDesc: A Security Guard is here, attempting to maintain order.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Not as efficient as a police officer, but then not as expensive either.

mobs.LongDesc: Fire Marshall Bob is busy trying to extinguish the fire that is on his back.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one poor excuse for a Fire Marshall.  He's obviously started more 
fires in his day than he's actually extinguished.  Just another sad example 
of nepotism in today's world!

mobs.LongDesc: A fireman is here, looking rather useless.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Well, the less skilled relatives of the Sparta executives needed a job 
somewhere, so they wound up here.  Obviously, its a very cushy job because
there are no real fires in New Sparta.

mobs.LongDesc: A whore is looking for customers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The only good attribute of this beast is her low prices, which would explain
why she is always busy with punks and skinheads.

mobs.LongDesc: A minor throat is busy doing homework.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one of the weakest of the evil inhabitants of the library.  They 
will do anything for a good grade or to keep a good man down.

mobs.LongDesc: A throat is here, looking for someone's notes to steal.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one of the most populated species of the library.  They're really 
desperate for a good grade.

mobs.LongDesc: A major throat is busy hiding all the science reference books.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a barely human creature that has absolutely no morals or sense of
dignity.

mobs.LongDesc: A senior throat is burning all the useful books.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a devilish looking creature that would gladly sell its' sister into 
slavery for a good grade.

mobs.LongDesc: The master throat is here, trying to break into the school records.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The master throat is the devilish and desperate creature that lacks any
morals or self dignity.  Watch out, its' eyeing your stuff right now!

mobs.LongDesc: A cheerleader is here rooting on the home team.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Wow!  Don't you wish there were more girls like these around?  Almost 
nothing rivals the beauty of the cheerleaders, unfortunately their looks
are not always matched by their brains (unfortunately for them, but lucky
for YOU!!), though you are positive you could forget about that fact
for just a few hours.

mobs.LongDesc: Ilsa the Head Cheerleader is here, looking totally gorgeous!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You gaze at this beauty with long, flowing blonde hair, an angelic,
calming face, firm, ample..... and a body that just screams......!
You snap out of your daydream and notice that she is frowning at you,
as she does not appreciate people undressing her with their eyes.

mobs.LongDesc: Chief O'Hara is sitting behind his desk. Looks like he's finally gotten a clue.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Chief is a longtime law enforcement agent who has become overweight
from years of eating donuts.  He is a jolly Irishman, who for the first
time will have to do his job without the services of Batman.  Unfortunately
for you, he actually looks up to the job now!

mobs.LongDesc: The Warden is here guarding the jail.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A staunch proponent of the death penalty, and the keeper of the jail key.

mobs.LongDesc: A maid is here cleaning up after the guests.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The maid is a lady weary from constant upkeep of the hotel who views most of 
mankind as slobs.

mobs.LongDesc: Esprit is behind bars, where he belongs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The law finally caught up to this character killer, who is serving
an indefinite sentence.  May this be a lesson to you all.

mobs.LongDesc: A cashier is busy filing her nails.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a student working at her part-time job.  She really would rather
be somewhere else, but needs the money for tuition.

mobs.LongDesc: The Cop is sitting here eating donuts.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You can see that this guy does not concentrate very much on his job and tends 
to look the other way.  He seems to be more interested in filling his belly 
with donuts than in protecting the city.

mobs.LongDesc: The Cop is sitting here having a drink.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You can see that this guy does not concentrate very much on his job and tends 
to look the other way.  He seems to be more interested in filling his belly 
with beer than in protecting the city.

mobs.LongDesc: A New SpartaCON conventioneer stands here drooling.
mobs.DetailedDesc: You see a nerd like comic dude with gressy hair and sweat stains under his arms

mobs.LongDesc: A fisherman is waiting to serve you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy's been around fish so long that he's beginning to look and smell
like one.

mobs.LongDesc: An arms dealer is cleaning his guns.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Like most arms dealers, he's got greased back hair and a slimy mustache.

mobs.LongDesc: Raghuram the 7-11 Manager is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Like most 7-11 managers, Raghuram is Indian, and speaks with a near 
incomprehensible accent.

mobs.LongDesc: Launchpad McQuack is here following Darkwing.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a tall humanoid duck who is quite confused and very dim-witted, but
definitely no duck to f*ck with.

>
You instinctively retch in reaction to looking at this horrible thing!

mobs.LongDesc: A bleached blonde bimbo is bouncing around.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You can almost feel the intelligence and wisdom points being reduced as you
feel the blood rush from your head to another part of your anatomy.

mobs.LongDesc: A stripper is here, undressing for your entertainment.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Wow, you have never seen such big h00ters before in your life, it really makes
you believe that there is a God! (and he likes big butts too ;)

mobs.LongDesc: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive as
well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith.
His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel attacks and
his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly
opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as possible,
using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how and where to use
them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes him a deadly opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: A knight is guarding the entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses.  She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your god; he has
a peaceful, loving look.  You notice that he is surrounded by a white aura.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it -
the way of the true thief.  She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.

mobs.LongDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars
across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He
has a calm look on his face.

mobs.LongDesc: A retired Captain stands here, selling boats.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This Captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.

mobs.LongDesc: An Armorer stands here displaying his shiny new (and previously owned) armors.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An old but very strong armorer.  He has made more armors in his life than you
have ever seen.

mobs.LongDesc:
A receptionist stands in front of you, looking at you like you were the
center of the universe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A tired looking waiter.

mobs.LongDesc:
A man who in his young days was a famous sorcerer but now leads a quiet,
peaceful life as a waiter.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter who seems to have reach contact with God.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A waiter who knows where all his costumers has their money.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc:
A waiter is here who looks like he could easily kill you while still carrying
quite a few firebreathers.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.
Beastly Fido is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging
around his teeth.

mobs.LongDesc: A singing, happy Drunk.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

mobs.LongDesc: A small loyal Kitten is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The Kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A small loyal Puppy is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The Puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A small, quick, loyal Beagle is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The Beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A large, loyal Rottweiler is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The Rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A large, trained Wolf is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The Wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: A dealer with no life is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a to be frank...fat overweight slob nerd geek lardass comic dealer,
who wants your comic collection and to score for once in his life.
